functions.name: pinMode
functions.description: Configures the specified pin to behave either as an input or an output

functions.name: digitalWrite
functions.description: Write a HIGH or LOW value to a digital pin

functions.name: digitalRead
functions.description: Reads the value from a specified digital pin

functions.name: analogRead
functions.description: Reads the value from the specified analog pin

functions.name: analogWrite
functions.description: Writes an analog value (PWM wave) to a pin

functions.name: analogReference
functions.description: Configures the reference voltage used for analog input

functions.name: delay
functions.description: Pauses the program for the amount of time (in milliseconds)

functions.name: delayMicroseconds
functions.description: Pauses the program for the amount of time (in microseconds)

functions.name: millis
functions.description: Returns the number of milliseconds since the Arduino board began running

functions.name: micros
functions.description: Returns the number of microseconds since the Arduino board began running

functions.name: tone
functions.description: Generates a square wave of the specified frequency on a pin

functions.name: noTone
functions.description: Stops the generation of a square wave triggered by tone()

functions.name: pulseIn
functions.description: Reads a pulse on a pin

functions.name: shiftOut
functions.description: Shifts out a byte of data one bit at a time

functions.name: shiftIn
functions.description: Shifts in a byte of data one bit at a time

functions.name: map
functions.description: Re-maps a number from one range to another

functions.name: constrain
functions.description: Constrains a number to be within a range

functions.name: min
functions.description: Calculates the minimum of two numbers

functions.name: max
functions.description: Calculates the maximum of two numbers

functions.name: abs
functions.description: Calculates the absolute value of a number

functions.name: pow
functions.description: Calculates the value of a number raised to a power

functions.name: sqrt
functions.description: Calculates the square root of a number

functions.name: random
functions.description: Generates a pseudo-random number

functions.name: randomSeed
functions.description: Initializes the pseudo-random number generator

functions.name: attachInterrupt
functions.description: Specifies a named Interrupt Service Routine (ISR) to call

functions.name: detachInterrupt
functions.description: Turns off the given interrupt

functions.name: noInterrupts
functions.description: Disables interrupts

functions.name: interrupts
functions.description: Re-enables interrupts after noInterrupts()

methods.name: begin
methods.description: Sets the data rate in bits per second (baud)

methods.name: available
methods.description: Returns the number of bytes available to read

methods.name: peek
methods.description: Returns the next byte without removing it from the buffer

methods.name: print
methods.description: Prints data to the serial port as human-readable ASCII text

methods.name: println
methods.description: Prints data to the serial port followed by a carriage return and newline

methods.name: write
methods.description: Writes binary data to the serial port

methods.name: flush
methods.description: Waits for the transmission of outgoing serial data to complete

methods.name: setTimeout
methods.description: Sets the maximum milliseconds to wait for serial data

methods.name: readString
methods.description: Reads characters from the serial buffer into a String

methods.name: parseInt
methods.description: Returns the first valid integer from the serial buffer

methods.name: parseFloat
methods.description: Returns the first valid floating point number from the serial buffer
